TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class TrackBar Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize
type TrackBar = class inherit Control interface ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示一个标准的 Windows 跟踪条。

span.span: Represents a standard Windows track bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是类似于 控件的可滚动控件。The is a scrollable control similar to the control. 您可以通过设置 "" 属性来配置跟踪栏 属性的值滚动的范围，以指定范围的下限，并使用 属性指定范围的上限。You can configure ranges through which the value of the property of a track bar scrolls by setting the property to specify the lower end of the range and the property to specify the upper end of the range. 属性定义在滚动框的任意一侧发生单击时要在 属性中添加或减去的增量。The property defines the increment to add or subtract from the property when clicks occur on either side of the scroll box. 跟踪条可以水平或垂直显示。The track bar can be displayed horizontally or vertically. 您可以使用该控件输入通过 属性获取的数值数据。You can use this control to input numeric data obtained through the property. 可以在控件中显示此数值数据，也可以在代码中使用它。You can display this numeric data in a control or use it in code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件和一个 控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 当 事件发生时， 内容会更新为 属性值。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用默认水平方向创建 ，范围为0到10，其中每个值都显示一个刻度线。The is created with a default horizontal orientation and a range of 0 to 10, with a tick mark shown for every value.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否自动调整跟踪条的高度或宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.

value.span: 如果自动调整跟踪条的大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将 属性设置为 `true`，以使跟踪栏调整其高度（水平对齐）或宽度（如果垂直对齐）。You can set the property to `true` to cause the track bar to adjust its height (if horizontally aligned) or width (if vertically aligned). 高度或宽度根据显示跟踪条的屏幕分辨率调整为标准大小。The height or width is adjusted to a standard size based on the screen resolution on which the track bar is displayed. 如果要自行调整大小，请将 属性设置为 `false`。Set the property to `false` if you want to adjust the size yourself.

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `TrackBar1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TrackBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，当滚动框长距离移动时向 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
A numeric value.
The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键或单击滚动框两侧的跟踪栏时， 属性会根据 属性中设置的值进行更改。When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 您可以考虑将 值设置为 （对于垂直方向的跟踪条）或 （对于水平方向的跟踪栏）值的百分比。You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) value. 这会使跟踪条的移动距离与其大小成正比。This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件和一个 控件。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 当 事件发生时， 内容会更新为 属性值。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 事件来更新其他控件，因为滚动框的位置会更改。You can use the event to update other controls as the position of the scroll box changes. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，请确保调用基类的 " 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下某个箭头键时， 属性会根据 属性中设置的值进行更改。When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 您可以考虑将 的值设置为 （对于垂直方向的跟踪条）或 （对于水平方向的跟踪条）属性的值的百分比。You might consider setting the value of to a percentage of the value of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) property. 这会将跟踪条的移动距离设置为与其大小成正比。This sets the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件和一个 控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 当 事件发生时， 内容会更新为 属性值。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定控件上绘制的刻度之间的增量。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.

value.span: 表示刻度之间的增量的数值。

span.span: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于在 和 属性之间具有大量值的 ，在控件上绘制值的所有刻度可能不切实际。For a with a large range of values between the and the properties, it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. 例如，如果控件的范围为100，则在此处传递值5将导致控件绘制20个刻度。For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of 5 here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. 在这种情况下，每个刻度在值范围中表示5个单位。In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个窗体，该窗体包含一个 控件和一个 控件。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 该示例演示如何设置 、、和 属性以及如何处理 事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 当 事件发生时， 内容会更新为 属性值。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当跟踪条中表示的值更改时，可以使用此事件来更新其他控件。You can use this event to update other controls when the value represented in the track bar changes. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 、和 成员以及如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含 控件名称 `TrackBar1` 和名为 `TextBox1` 控件的窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control name `TrackBar1` and a control named `TextBox1`. 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `InitializeTrackBar` 方法。Call the `InitializeTrackBar` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
